about_the_game:
Liminal Shroud is an exploration experience that takes you deep into the heart of uncanny in-between spaces where reality unravels and sanity is questioned. There are no physical monsters here—after all, what could be more terrifying than your own mind? This walking simulator entices your curiosity, inviting you to explore and interact with eerily familiar but strange environments. Can you uncover the secrets and escape with your sanity intact?

As you navigate this myriad of endless hallways and strangely layered rooms, your perception blurs. Each step forward uncovers fragments of a mystery, while the echoes of some distant happenings take their toll on your senses.

Lost in an eerie labyrinth of dated carpet and walls coated in lead paint, you feel the weight of an unknown purpose. The hum of flickering lights, swaths of heavy curtains, and faded furniture from a long ago decade evokes nostalgia laced with dread. Is something waiting around the corner? Or are you merely slipping deeper into the depths of a psychological mire? Find out—if you dare.

Allow yourself to sate curiosity and engage with the environments you explore. Sit down in a retro vinyl chair for a quick breather, or maybe fiddle with a radio. But beware… that very radio, chair, or even a random bouncy ball might just be a doorway to another reality.

Inspired by internet lore such as The Backrooms and The Thompson Extension, fans of liminal spaces and analog horror will find Liminal Shroud a familiar but enticingly unique adventure.

Features:

  • First-Person exploration

  • Interactive environment

  • Solve puzzles

  • Uncover mysteries

  • Auto-saves

name: Liminal Shroud

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Walking simulator, immersive horror. An eerie exploration experience that takes you deep into the heart of uncanny, in-between spaces where reality unravels. Liminal spaces entice your curiosity, inviting you to explore, uncover their secrets and escape with your sanity intact.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
